service.name: scheduleEntityIndexing
service.description: Registers entity ID or values for indexing queueing at the end of the transaction or in global queue immediately if no transaction or requested.

attribute.name: event
attribute.description: Supported: trans-commit (default - appends to transaction, only indexes if committed), global-queue (skips transaction queue and appends to global EntityIndexer queue)

attribute.name: topics
attribute.description: Names of subscriber topics to limit which subscribers are triggered

attribute.name: action
attribute.description: Supported values: add (same as addToSolr), remove (same as removeFromSolr), auto (default - this either adds or removes based on whether or not the productId still exists in the database)

attribute.name: entitiesToIndex
attribute.description: Map of entity names to ordered maps of entity PKs to EntityIndexer.Entry instances, used for trans-commit event

attribute.name: flush
attribute.description: Whether to force-flush any of the queued entities. Values: auto (default), all (flush all products in global queue a.s.a.p. including these)

service.name: runEntityIndexing
service.description: Processes entity ID or values for indexing from EntityIndexer global queue NOTE: There is only ever one implementation running for each entity at a time, internally locked, and this service should only be called internally.

service.name: scheduleAllEntityIndexing
service.description: Registers all found entities for indexing queueing in global queue immediately.

attribute.name: topics
attribute.description: Names of subscriber topics to limit which subscribers are triggered

attribute.name: action
attribute.description: Supported values: add (same as addToSolr), remove (same as removeFromSolr), auto (default - this either adds or removes based on whether or not the productId still exists in the database)

attribute.name: flush
attribute.description: Whether to force-flush any of the queued entities. Values: auto (default), all (flush all products in global queue a.s.a.p. including these)

service.name: scheduleProductIndexing
service.description: Registers product ID or values for indexing queueing at the end of the transaction or in global queue immediately if no transaction or requested. Replaces registerUpdateToSolr.

attribute.name: updateVariants
attribute.description: If true, also update the variant products immediately associated to this one (added 2018-07-19). (NOTE: ignored if effective action is product removal)

attribute.name: updateVariantsDeep
attribute.description: If true, also update the variant products associated to this one (added 2018-07-19), and their variants, etc. (NOTE: ignored if effective action is product removal)

attribute.name: updateVirtual
attribute.description: If true, also update the virtual product immediately associated to this one (added 2018-07-25). (NOTE: ignored if effective action is product removal)

attribute.name: updateVirtualDeep
attribute.description: If true, also update the virtual product associated to this one (added 2018-07-25), and its virtuals, etc. (NOTE: ignored if effective action is product removal)

service.name: scheduleAllProductIndexing
service.description: Registers all found products for indexing queueing in global queue immediately.

attribute.name: refEntries
attribute.description: Collection of the original entity primary key PKs that triggered this consume, before expansion, for error handling

attribute.name: onError
attribute.description: ignore (default), requeue-all (requeue products for all consumers - e.g. solr and google), requeue-topic (requeue products for current consumer - solr or google)
